taxAccess.stepTwoBody: To access your tax records, we need to verify your information and get you access to New Jersey Department of Treasury's Gov2Go platform.
taxAccess.modalTaxIdMarkdown:
Enter your 12-digit New Jersey Tax ID number (xxx-xxx-xxx/xxx).

Find your New Jersey Tax ID (also known as "NJ Taxpayer ID" and "Filer ID") in your email with the subject line, "Confirmation of New Jersey Business Registration."
taxAccess.failedErrorMessageHeader: The following fields are incorrect or missing information:
taxAccess.failedBusinessFieldHelper: Enter the name shown in your tax confirmation email.
taxAccess.failedResponsibleOwnerFieldHelper: Enter the responsible owner listed in your tax confirmation email.
taxAccess.stepTwoErrorBanner: Review the fields below for errors or omissions
taxAccess.modalBusinessOwnerDescription: Enter your Last Name, First Name and Middle Initial. The name must match exactly the "Responsible Owner Name" listed on your tax confirmation email.
taxAccess.failedTaxIdHelper: Enter the 12-digit Tax ID shown in your tax confirmation email.
taxAccess.stepOneBody: To see your tax due dates, you'll first need to select your business structure.
taxAccess.failedUnknownMarkdown: There was a problem with your verification process, please try again later.
taxAccess.modalBusinessFieldMarkdown: Enter your business name exactly as it appears on your `Business Registration Certificate|business-reg-certificate` or in your tax registration confirmation email.
